channel.title: Is There Any Cool/Good Banner Making Website?
channel.description: Im Not That Good With Html Banner Stuff :|

item.title: Is There Any Cool/Good Banner Making Website?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:4, topic:434078”][quote author=SkyVip link=topic=536796.msg3924971#msg3924971 date=1330126028]
Not Necessarily, You need Html For The Placement Using Adobe Flash And Many Others.
[/quote]

What? Banners are images… HTML is the (I’m guessing), you’re website. HTML has nothing to do with designing the banner.

Just make the banner and do

Note that I don’t actually know HTML, I just think that’s right from when I tried to learn a bit a few years ago.[/quote]

It will validate now.

Read full topic
item.source: Is There Any Cool/Good Banner Making Website?

item.title: Is There Any Cool/Good Banner Making Website?
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:6, topic:434078”][quote author=SkyVip link=topic=536796.msg3924952#msg3924952 date=1330124189]
Im Not That Good With Html Banner Stuff
[/quote]

You seem confused.
HTML is the shit you see, CSS is the style you see in the page. Images are a whole different story…

You make the images with photoshop, paint, gimp, or any other image editing software. If you want to make a banner, you could always go on google and search for ‘free banner maker’. Or you can buy (or pirate) photoshop and slowly learn how to use it.[/quote]

^^^ percisely

Read full topic
item.source: Is There Any Cool/Good Banner Making Website?

item.title: Is There Any Cool/Good Banner Making Website?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

SkyVip:

Im Not That Good With Html Banner Stuff

You seem confused.
HTML is the shit you see, CSS is the style you see in the page. Images are a whole different story…

You make the images with photoshop, paint, gimp, or any other image editing software. If you want to make a banner, you could always go on google and search for ‘free banner maker’. Or you can buy (or pirate) photoshop and slowly learn how to use it.

Read full topic
item.source: Is There Any Cool/Good Banner Making Website?
